definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum

sentences.english: Liberal Arts And Sciences, General Studies And Humanities.
sentences.chinese: 文科和理科，通识教育与人文。

sentences.english: General education in the Republic of China's military academies is also shaped in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 我国军事院校的通识教育亦不例外。

sentences.english: President of TESPA, Director, General Education Center, China University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 台湾专业英语文学会，中国科技大学通识教育中心。

sentences.english: The last part investigates the significance of Conant's ideas of general education.
sentences.chinese: 第七部分主要探讨了科南特通识教育思想的借鉴意义。

sentences.english: Curriculum Development Officer of Liberal Studies Section would be attached to this Event.
sentences.chinese: 教育局通识教育组的课程发展主任将会随团出发。

sentences.english: The paper examines the history of General Education in American universities.
sentences.chinese: 本文考察了美国大学通识教育的历史递嬗。

sentences.english: For example, it is proclaimed that the so-called general education is only a supplement and relief to professional education.
sentences.chinese: 宣称通识也者，只是专业教育的辅助者或救援者。
